CITY COUNCIL MEETING
====================

![](https://mpcity.net/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/MPFavicon.png)

### REGULAR CITY COUNCIL MEETINGS OCCUR THE 1st & 3rd TUESDAYS OF EACH MONTH

Meetings are held at City Hall in the Council Chambers –
501 North Madison, Mount Pleasant, TX 75455
. The public are welcome to attend with limited seating.

Agendas for this meeting can be downloaded from our
[Agenda/Minutes](https://mpcity.net/agendas-minutes)
page.

You can also watch the meeting
[via our YouTube video stream](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYEVbYfNtM-pGQcux-9YbDg/videos)
(opens in a new window).




* [+ Add to Google Calendar](https://calendar.google.com/calendar/render?action=TEMPLATE&text=CITY+COUNCIL+MEETING&dates=20260204T000000Z/20260204T020000Z&details=%0D%0AREGULAR+CITY+COUNCIL+MEETINGS+OCCUR+THE+1st+%26amp%3B+3rd+TUESDAYS+OF+EACH+MONTH%0D%0AMeetings+are+held+at+City+Hall+in+the+Council+Chambers+-+501+North+Madison%2C+Mount+Pleasant%2C+TX+75455.+The+public+are+welcome+to+attend+with+limited+seating.%0D%0A%0D%0AAgendas+for+this+meeting+can+be+downloaded+from+our+Agenda%2FMinutes+%28+http%3A%2F%2Fmpcity.net%2Fagendas-minutes+%29+page.%0D%0A%0D%0A%0D%0A%0D%0AYou+can+also+watch%C2%A0the+meeting+via+our+YouTube+video+stream+%28opens+in+a+new+window%29.%0D%0A%0D%0A%26nbsp%3B&location=501+North+Madison%2C+Mount+Pleasant%2C+TX+75455&recur=RRULE%3AFREQ%3DMONTHLY%3BWKST%3DMO%3BBYDAY%3D1TU%2C3TU)
* [+ iCal / Outlook export](https://mpcity.net/?method=ical&id=204)
